summary: Weeks from her final exams, part-time teacher Valentine meets a very different musician. Just a one-night stand and back to preparing for exams, she thinks.
cast: Sophie Marceau|Vincent Lindon|Élisabeth Vitali|Jean-Claude Leguay|Elena Pompei|Roberto Attias|Brigitte Chamarande|Christian Pereira|Beppe Chierici|Nathalie Mann|Anne Macina|Janine Souchon|Virginie Demians|Hugues Leforestier|Jacqueline Noëlle|Marc-André Brunet|Isabelle Caubère|André Chazel|Med Salah Cheurfi|Guillaume Corea|Gérard Dacier|Éric Denize|Gilles Gaston-Dreyfus|Benoît Gourley|Marc Innocenti|Najim Laouriga|Laurent Ledermann|Philippe Maygal|Dominique Pifarely|Ysé Tran|Francis Terzian|François Ozon|Marie-Christine Barrault|Jacques Chancel|Élie Chouraqui|Vladimir Cosma|Daniel Couteau|Isabelle Thévenet
title: L'étudiante
